scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && node-sass-chokidar src/ -o src/ --watch --recursive
scripts.init: node util/init.js && node util/check-server.js && npm run watch-css & node ./node_modules/react-scripts/bin/react-scripts.js start
scripts.start: HOST=0.0.0.0 npm run dev-server & npm run watch-css & node ./node_modules/react-scripts/bin/react-scripts.js start
scripts.reset-packages: (rm -rf node_modules & (cd server && rm -rf node_modules) & rm package-lock.json & rm yarn.lock) && yarn install
scripts.dev-server-no-daemon: npm run mysql && pm2 delete cra-sails; pm2 start ./ecosystem.config.yml --no-daemon --env development --only cra-sails
scripts.dev-server-daemon: npm run mysql && pm2 delete cra-sails; pm2 start ./ecosystem.config.yml --env development --only cra-sails
scripts.dev-server: npm run mysql && pm2 delete cra-sails-watch; pm2 start ./ecosystem.config.yml --no-daemon --env development --only cra-sails-watch
scripts.docker: docker build -t cra-sails . && docker run -it cra-sails
scripts.push-all: npm run test-all-ci && git checkout staging && git merge master && git checkout production && git merge staging && git push --all && git checkout master
scripts.push-staging: git checkout staging && git merge master && git push --all && git checkout master
scripts.versions:
echo '
Local versions:'&&curl http://localhost:4888/api/v1/version && echo '
Live versions:' && curl http://18.130.74.72/api/v1/version && echo '
'
scripts.mysql: docker stop local-mysql-server ; docker rm local-mysql-server ; docker run --name local-mysql-server -p 3306:3306 -e MYSQL_ALLOW_EMPTY_PASSWORD=true -e MYSQL_DATABASE=cra-sails-local -e MYSQL_ROOT_HOST=% -d mysql/mysql-server:5.7 --character-set-server=utf8mb4 --collation-server=utf8mb4_unicode_ci
scripts.pull:
git pull && npm update && cd server && npm update && cd ../ && npm run restart-server && echo '
Ok! Ive pulled from git, updated client and server modules, and restarted the server'
